articles.author: Khanyiso Tshwaku
articles.title: Crowds make hay in Centurion sunshine as stadiums slowly return to old order
articles.description: Cricket made sure the 50 percent capacity gap that was announced by President Cyril Ramaphosa was taken full advantage of, even though home fans again played second fiddle to Bangladesh.
articles.content:
• Fans returned to SuperSport Park with a bang on Wednesday afternoon when South Africa played Bangladesh in the third ODI.
  • There were more Bangladeshi supporters at the ground, but the… [+1801 chars]

articles.title: Ash Barty retires at just 25, won three Grand Slam titles, made history for Australia and played cricket...
articles.content:

articles.title: What we learned from watching the 1992 World Cup final in full again | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.description: Wides, lbw calls, swing - plenty of things were different in white-ball cricket back then | ESPNcricinfo.com
articles.content: Last week, we at ESPNcricinfo did something we have been thinking of doing for eight years now: pretend-live ball-by-ball commentary for a classic cricket match. We knew the result, yes, but we tried… [+6823 chars]
